overview:
Ryan Stern has joined Glam as the VP of social community.

Ryan Stern was the Director of Community and Managing Editor of Foodbuzz. She joined the team in 2007 to manage content aggregation and develop the Foodbuzz blogger community.

Prior to Foodbuzz, she worked at CondÃ© Nast on the editorial team at Architectural Digest and her 7 years of editorial experience also include work at The Los Angeles Times and Santa Barbara Magazine.

Her blogging background began in 2006, when she launched her own food blog and experienced the unique camaraderie and passion for food and dining among food bloggers.

Ryan has a BA in Global Studies from University of California, Santa Barbara.
